article_title: Sutton's Last Stand: Judge In Same-Sex Marriage Case Declines To Overrule Democracy

article_metadata.author: Daniel Fisher

og.description: A conservative judge pens an impassioned plea for judicial restraint even as he acknowledge the tide is running in favor of same-sex marriage.
